title: Whenever I play Jhin and I hear him speak.

replies.body: Quite literally the only VO in this game i have actually listened to. in nearly 2 years of playing I have only unmuted the game to listen to him.
Then you missed out. Tahm, Sion and Kled, all wonderful.

They're all very unpleasant to hear though compared to Jhin. The thing with him is that his words are soothing unlike "I will wet my axe...ON YOUR BOOONES!!!". I mean we're talking about the voice not the personality. :P

> [{quoted}](name=LightTrack,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7NXHodOs,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2017-01-31T07:00:12.025+0000)
>wet my axe...ON YOUR BOOONES!!!

*whet
I mean, the way he gets to your bones, it's going to get wet, too.
What about Nasus?  His voice is awesome...
Well i have heard them from the interactions video but... Eh.. not fun to hear regularly
kledd isnt funny to you?? and tahms elegance doesnt sway you???? are you human behind that mask?
Kled is a maybe. And Tahm... i honestly hate Cajun accents. well not hate but ... eh
And Kindred, one of my favorites VO in the game *^*
nah
Whenever I play Kled with friends they always laugh because every time I speak they just hear him babbling away in the background.
Aurelion Sol is up there IMO, he's really good. So is Kled and Sion.
Aurelion Sol would be better if he booped more.
Kled is going to be up there once i pick him up.
That warm, fuzzy feeling you get when Sion's VO has been brought up 3 or 4 times just in this comment chain.
{{champion:150}}  choo choo panna. tf?

> [{quoted}](name=AndreiRayanovsky,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7NXHodOs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-30T23:29:33.023+0000)
>
> Quite literally the only VO in this game i have actually listened to. in nearly 2 years of playing I have only unmuted the game to listen to him.

i like sion, nautilus, urgot and gangplanks lines
Nautilus's VO is good mostly because of the sound effects and slight echo/deep effect, rather than the lines themselves. If he gets new lines too? That'd be amazing.

to me is sounds gay and psychotic
but if you like it, props to you

*artistic and psychotic. 
i don't think anything can have the sound of a sexuality
TFW you learn that "gay" means "happy".
tfw humanity deprived me of using a word because everyone would think I'm talking about sexual interest istead of understanding "I'm fucking happy you bitches"

And I'm here sitting like
http://i.imgur.com/9VzChI7.jpg?b
Taliyah, cuz she sounds so cute. Just me? okay{{champion:32}}

Saw an Archer ref. Wasn't disappointed in the slightest.

http://24.media.tumblr.com/ba1b6b0883f2d92c0c202e6582efe092/tumblr_mwu2o8n45S1qcgzbvo5_250.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/142UITjG5GjIRi/giphy.gif
He has that soothing voice.
{{champion:114}} Her voice
thought about downvoting to get the upvote counter closer to 44

It's funny because I got the Mecha Sion skin and used it for 40+ games. After I got all the skins on him I always mix it up and I realized, "Holy crap! his quotes are bonkers!" Now I barely use the Mecha skin just so I can hear the quotes.
Jhin is, hands down, the best champion Riot have come up with so far in terms of design. He is flawless.
Rengar, Braum and Jhin have the best VAs
